entries.journal_entry_description: You have been sent to help Draykken Bender assault a droid factory.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Hraykken Bender has sent you to his brother, Draykken, as muscle for an assault on a droid factory. Speak with Draykken to find out what he expects you to do.
entries.task00_waypoint_name: Draykken Bender at the Droid Factory
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Draykken Bender has sent you into the helper droid factory to destroy helper droids.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Assault on the Helper Droid Factory
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Draykken Bender and let him know of your success.
entries.task02_waypoint_name: Draykken Bender at the Droid Factory
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Defeat QU3-3N, or as Draykken Bender refers to her, the "Helper Droid Queen."
